document_data.name: The Murdered Manticore
document_data.mainbody: '''The Murdered Manticore''', or simply the '''Manticore''', was a nice [[inn]] to visit in [[Arabel]], [[Cormyr]], particularly if you wanted to hear juicy gossip or participate in illicit activities such as forgery.
document_data.Description: Heavy tapestries were prevalent through the Manticore, absorbing much of the sound from its occupants. Unbeknownst to the guests, secret passages connected every room.
document_data.Activites:
Despite the activities occurring under the roof the inn, the Murdered Manticore was a great place to stay because of the reasonable pricing and privacy afforded.

Though the Manticore did not serve food, drinks could be had aplenty.
